name: The Balloons: No Spikes Allowed Floaty Adventure
name_original: The Balloons: No Spikes Allowed Floaty Adventure
description:
The Balloons are back
To outer space
They just came in to find you here with that sad look upon your face
You should avoid that stupid pop, you should ride that gentle breeze
If I'd known for just one second spikes'd be back to bother me

Float on now, float, float through the sky
Don't turn around now
'Cause you're gonna pop and die
Weren't you the one who tried to shoot me with arrows
Do you think I'd let you
Did you think I'd let you steal the show?

Oh no, not I, I will survive
Oh, as long as I know how to float, I know I'll stay alive
I've got all my air for lift
And I've got all these coins to gift and I'll survive
I will survive, hey, hey
